MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the  LL55 postcode area of Caernarfon, affecting properties in Maes Meddyg, Gwel Y Llan, Gallt Y Sil and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  3:11 PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical cable network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:16PM on 19th March 2021.
